_header: Oft hath this song been put in ure
_description: John Redford, a song with varying refrains for use at Christmas and Easter — twenty-two 6-line stanzas (aaaabb) including a ‘Merie’ refrain and a 7-line heading: ‘Now will you be merye / And can you be merye’

BLAdd15233.First Lines:
Ofte hathe this songe bene put in vreThat hauest myrthe dothe
                    vertew allure…
BLAdd15233.Last Lines:
…With myrth god grawnt vs euery manThat we may all be merye
                    than
